content.html: We need to challenge the this idea of "militant atheism". I've never heard of any war, massacre or other military action carried out in the name of... Nothing. As long as religious institutions lobby for repressive new laws, the rest of us need to lobby harder against them.
content.value:
We need to challenge the this idea of "militant atheism". I've never heard of any war, massacre or other military action carried out in the name of... Nothing.

As long as religious institutions lobby for repressive new laws, the rest of us need to lobby harder against them.
